author: Gianna Francesca Catolico
title: Celebs, netizens awed as Barbie Forteza bares body for TV series | Inquirer Entertainment
text:
Celebs, netizens awed as Barbie Forteza bares body for TV series INQUIRER.net / 12:02 PM February 23, 2017 üçë A post shared by Barbie Forteza (@barbaraforteza) on Feb 21, 2017 at 11:21pm PST ADVERTISEMENT 
Netizens and celebrities heaped praises on Barbie Forteza after seeing on Instagram photos of her in a two-piece swimsuit for a scene on GMA 7‚Äôs rom-com ‚ÄúMeant to Be.‚Äù 
In the photos, posted on Wednesday, she flaunts her flawless body in a silver bikini. Together with her co-stars, they filmed a scene for the primetime soap at a beach in Laiya, Batangas. 
Many of Forteza‚Äôs fellow stars and friends in show biz posted good-hearted comments. Actresses Lovi Poe, Valeen Montenegro, Kris Bernal, Bela Padilla, Sanya Lopez, Matet de Leon and Bea Binene praised her for keeping up in shape for her scene. 
Ruru Madrid, co-star Ken Chan, singer Mark Bautista and director Gina Alajar also turned to the photo-sharing app to congratulate Forteza. 
Jerald Napoles and Joyce Ching reposted Forteza‚Äôs photo on their pages . ‚ÄúTeka lang, iba ‚Äòto (Wait a minute, this is different), I‚Äôm so proud!‚Äù Ching tweeted . Netizens and Forteza‚Äôs fans‚Äô clubs took notice of their idol‚Äôs summer figure and praised her, too. SCREENGRABS from Barbie Forteza/Instagram
